description.displayText: I highly recommend Suzanne to any parents searching for a caregiver. Her classroom experience and graduate-level study in early childhood education allowed her to create a highly personalized and learning-rich environment for our son. Much more than a caregiver, Suzanne advised us on developmental milestones and created activities tailored to our child's level of development.  As new parents, we benefited tremendously from Suzanne's' years of experience and her thoughtful, engaging and playful approach to childcare.

Her classroom experience and graduate-level study in early childhood education allowed her to create a highly personalized and learning-rich environment for our son. As new parents, we benefited tremendously from Suzanne's' years of experience and her thoughtful, engaging and playful approach to childcare.

description.displayText: We hired Suzanne to help with childcare for our one year old daughter and three year old son. Her years of experience can be seen in how she engages and cares for the children. She's punctual (early), professional, and a pleasure to be around.
